articles.description: The Miami Dolphins have won six of their past seven games despite an inconsistent run game, but that could be resolved for the final stretch of the regular season.

articles.author: Joe Giglio
articles.title: CFP ranking means UNC still in play for Orange Bowl - WRALSportsFan.com
articles.description: Even after a tough loss to Notre Dame, UNC could still land in a major college football bowl game for the first time since 1950. Here's how the College Football Rankings help UNC's chances for a spot in the Orange Bowl.
articles.content:
By Joe Giglio, WRALSportsFan
North Carolinas loss to Notre Dame actually helped them in the College Football Playoff rankings.

articles.description: Rocket Watts had 20 points in first start at point guard, while Foster Loyer made key plays off the bench in Michigan State basketball's win at Duke.

articles.title: If the Eagles fire Doug Pederson, should the Jets pursue him as their next head coach? - NJ.com
